lines.text: So, we meet again, Fury.
Well, I'm not surprised, Pincer. Guys like you tend to cling to the bowl no matter how many times you flush.
Beauty is trust and trust is beauty. That's all ye on this Earth know and all ye need to know.
Is that part of the recognition code?
No, I just felt like saying it.
This is Hydra headquarters calling S.H.I.E.L.D. on the wave of the orca, is anybody listening?
Nick! Thank God. I thought you were dead.

[on viewscreen]
I was. But now I'm better.
I will see you in Hell for this.
We'll do lunch.
I was top of my class in advanced silent killing. I can do this in my sleep.
Helluva way to earn our keep, isn't it Vaughn? Babysittin' a corpse. Baron Wolfgang Von Strucker. Last of the great global boogeymen.
[sighs]
Ours not to reason why, ours but to do and die
[Vaughn shoots him]
Contessa Valentina de Allegro Fontaine. Quite a mouthful when you try and wrap your tongue around it. Don't let the blue blood fool ya, Pierce. Val's an old hand at the sexpionage game, aren't ya?
Is it true what women say about you?
Well, it depends on your talking to one of my ex-wifes or my mother.
Pleasant dreams, Fury, I told you revenge was mine and now Zola will be too.

[Fury has been injected with deadly Columbian tree frog poison]
Brilliant. How long do I have before Kermit bites me the big one?
Gabe, I do not intend to spend the last few hours of my life on this planet in the Helicarrier's sick bay. I'll get that vampire's blood if I have to suck it from her neck.

[as a hologram]
Rest assured against a force such as ours there is no protection. Against Hydra there is no S.H.I.E.L.D.
You alright, Col?
Between you and me and the ESP chip in your head, I'm beginning to feel the effects of Viper's cocktail.
No takers, Pincer. Catch you on the rebound.

[on viewscreen]
Don't you dare cut me off, you comic-book cowboy!

[to Viper]
I danced on your poisonous father's grave. I'll dance on your grave too, sweetness.

[flips up Fury's eyepatch]
An electronic lock-pick!
Oh, there it is. I thought I left it in my other patch.
Head nurse to Surgeon. Operation over. Patient sedated.
You know he's a bit uglier than I remember, your frozen pop-sicle. Get it, Andrea? Pop-sicle?
no sence of humor.
I thought I'd lost you, father.
I have walked through the fires of Hell, looked into the face of the Beast and I have returned. Let the world tremble this night. Our work has just begun.

[Fury's body is being scanned for poison]
I feel like a damn bratwurst here. Either get me out of here, or get me some mustard.
You see, the eh, charming thing about the electronics industry, is the remarkably tidy records that they keep.
Are you really up to leading a field operation?
Of course not, Gabe! But who the hell else is gonna do this? The LMD?
Nick, what do you want me to say? That it happened too fast between us? That Clay got in the way? I got scared, I walked.
Yeah, into someone elses bed!
Well, I learned that move from you.
